Others: Dalton Knecht earned his first NBA and LA Lakers start on Wednesday against the Memphis Grizzlies.
He finished the quarter playing 9:54 minutes, scoring three points after making a 3 on his third attempt.
Knecht played only five minutes in the second quarter and added a rebound.
He played another 12 minutes in the second half but exited the game with a jaw injury, going scoreless in that stretch, missing his three shot attempts.
LeBron James waged a lone war for the team with 39 points on 62.5% shooting.
The Lakers dropped to 4-4 on the season, including 1-4 on their five-game road trip.
